item.title: Code As Design
item.description: “worm's eye-view photography of ceiling” by Joshua Sortino on Unsplash In 1992 Jack Reeves published an essay What Is Software Design? in the C++ Journal. His basic premise is: “that final source code is the real software design.” He goes on to explain… > “The final goal of any engineering activity is some type of documentation. When a design effort is complete, the design documentation is turned over to the manufacturing team.
